1274050.name: Project Genesis Soundtrack
1274050.description: Taking the energy of space battles combined with the fast paced action of FPS combat, composer C.P. O'Neill has created an intense soundscape to help bring Project Genesis to life. Using strings, synths, and a melodic touch, the original soundtrack is an intense listening experience. The original soundtrack features 11 tracks focused on the intensity of the game play and unique lore of Project Genesis.
